ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Classes and methods for handling genetic data. Includes classes to represent genotypes and haplotypes at single markers up to multiple markers on multiple chromosomes. Function include allele frequencies, flagging homo/heterozygotes, flagging carriers of certain alleles, estimating and testing for Hardy-Weinberg disequilibrium, estimating and testing for linkage disequilibrium, ...

Classes and methods for handling genetic data. Includes classes to represent genotypes and haplotypes at single markers up to multiple markers on multiple chromosomes. Function include allele frequencies, flagging homo/heterozygotes, flagging carriers of certain alleles, estimating and testing for Hardy-Weinberg disequilibrium, estimating and testing for linkage disequilibrium, ...

name: r-genetics
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.8.1.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-genetics
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/genetics_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/genetics/genetics_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fef2c95f6a57f32b3cf4acf003480439462bb28297c501c617de307bfeee9252

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-combinat
    - r-gdata
    - r-gtools
    - r-mvtnorm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-combinat
    - r-gdata
    - r-gtools
    - r-mvtnorm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('genetics')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('genetics')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=genetics
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Classes and methods for handling genetic data. Includes classes to represent genotypes and haplotypes at single markers up to multiple markers on multiple chromosomes. Function include allele frequencies, flagging homo/heterozygotes, flagging carriers of certain alleles, estimating and testing for Hardy-Weinberg
    disequilibrium, estimating and testing for linkage disequilibrium, ...
  license_family: GPL
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: genetics
# Title: Population Genetics
# Version: 1.3.8.1.2
# Date: 2012-11-26
# Author: Gregory Warnes, with contributions from Gregor Gorjanc, Friedrich Leisch, and Michael Man.
# Maintainer: Gregory Warnes <greg@warnes.net>
# Depends: combinat, gdata, gtools, MASS, mvtnorm
# Description: Classes and methods for handling genetic data. Includes classes to represent genotypes and haplotypes at single markers up to multiple markers on multiple chromosomes. Function include allele frequencies, flagging homo/heterozygotes, flagging carriers of certain alleles, estimating and testing for Hardy-Weinberg disequilibrium, estimating and testing for linkage disequilibrium, ...
# License: GPL
# Packaged: 2019-04-21 11:05:10 UTC; ripley
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-04-22 06:57:07 UTC
# NeedsCompilation: no
